original_title: ドラマチックメモリー 炎のアルペンローゼ
overview: Two-part OVA that sumarizes the entire Alpen Rose TV series featuring a new dubbing and reworked scenes.  While walking through the Swiss countryside, Randy finds a small girl who seems to be the only surviving person from an airplane crash. The little girl doesn't remember anything, so Randy decides to take care of her and names her Judy. Both of them go through their childhood together. A few years later, Judy, now 16 years old, wants to discover her past. With the help of Randy, she leaves to search for her origins. Her single clue is a song that she keeps hearing in her head, a song called Alpine Rose. In this time World War, these two young people will have to overcome many obstacles to reach their goal, while having only each other for comfort and support.
title: Blazing Alpenrose
